SEARCH
Package gw.cc.vendormanagement.entity

Interface ServiceRequestDocumentLink

public interface ServiceRequestDocumentLink
ServiceRequestDocumentLink Associates a Service Request to a Document.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    DOCUMENT_TO_VENDOR_ADDED_EVENT
    Name of the add to vendor document event

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Document
    getLinkedDocument()
    Find the document linked to a ServiceRequestDocumentLink, or null if the current user does not have permission to view the document.

  • Field Details

    • DOCUMENT_TO_VENDOR_ADDED_EVENT

      static final String DOCUMENT_TO_VENDOR_ADDED_EVENT
      Name of the add to vendor document event
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getLinkedDocument

      Document getLinkedDocument()
      Find the document linked to a ServiceRequestDocumentLink, or null if the current user does not have permission to view the document. If plugin enabled, gets the document from the plugin, falling back on the DB in case the linkage between ServiceRequestDocumentLink and document has not been saved to the plugin yet. Otherwise, gets the document from the DB.
      Returns:
      document linked to the ServiceRequestDocumentLink
